pages___buttons.title: Pushing the boundaries of software delivery
pages___buttons.meta_title: Meet UXDX's Speakers 2019 | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: We bring the brightest UX, Dev and Product speakers from world-class companies to share tangible case studies and their success stories at the UXDX conference.

pages___buttons.title: Challenge Your Assumptions
pages___buttons.meta_title: Discover UXDX's Agenda 2019 | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: Your UXDX conference ticket gives you access to 40+ talks by world-class product leaders, 5 hands-on workshops. Meet people from Google, Uber, Mastercard and more.

pages___buttons.title: Training at UXDX 2019
pages___buttons.meta_title: Training at UXDX 2019
pages___buttons.meta_description: Take the motivating case studies to the next level by learning the key steps required to turn theory into practice

pages___buttons.title: Our 2019 Partners
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Partners 2019, 7-8 October, Dublin
pages___buttons.meta_description: Some of the amazing companies you can meet and interact with on UXDX 2019

pages___buttons.title: Knowledge Sharing and Connection Building
pages___buttons.meta_title: Meet 2000+ Product, Design and Dev Professionals on UXDX 2019
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX thrives on its relaxed environment. We encourage you to connect and meet some of the amazing people who will attend our biggest event yet on 7-8 October in Dublin.

pages___buttons.title: Venue
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Takes Place in the RDS | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX takes place in Ireland's best known venue, the RDS in Dublin. Explore the magnificent building and the global tech hub Dublin during the 2-day conference.

pages___buttons.title: Tickets
pages___buttons.meta_title: Get Your Ticket for UXDX 2019 | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: The UXDX conference provides amazing value for product managers, designers, developers, marketers and business owners. Get your ticket early to secure your place.

pages___buttons.title: The UXDX Model
pages___buttons.meta_title: How teams move from Waterfall Projects to Product Teams
pages___buttons.meta_description: Teams are starting to discover that you can't scale with waterfall processes. But how are they supposed to make the change to product teams? The UXDX model takes teams through the benefits, process, structures and governance of product teams.

pages___buttons.title: UXDX Community
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Community Events 2019
pages___buttons.meta_description: In the interest of promoting continuous learning for our attendees, we keep expanding our community events all over the world. Come and join us in your city (almost) for free.

pages___buttons.title: Venue
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Takes Place in the RDS | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX takes place in Ireland's best known venue, the RDS in Dublin. Explore the magnificent building and the global tech hub Dublin during the 2-day conference.

pages___buttons.title: Partner
pages___buttons.meta_title: Connecting you with those who want solutions to build better products, faster
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX helps you reach your target audience. We gather over 2000 product managers, developers, designers and marketers looking for a new solution to build better products.

pages___buttons.title: Share your Vision
pages___buttons.meta_title: Come and Speak at UXDX 2019 | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: We're looking for the best product speakers from around the world to share their vision and educate our audience. Come and build your profile at UXDX 2019.

pages___buttons.title: Tickets
pages___buttons.meta_title: Get Your Ticket for UXDX 2019 | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: The UXDX conference provides amazing value for product managers, designers, developers, marketers and business owners. Get your ticket early to secure your place.

pages___buttons.title: UX @ UXDX
pages___buttons.meta_title: Integrating UX into Product Delivery
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX conference is based around the UXDX model which integrates UX into the Development loop by breaking down the barriers between development, design and research teams.

pages___buttons.title: Developers @ UXDX
pages___buttons.meta_title: Developer Experience - Building a DevOps Culture
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX conference is based around the UXDX model in which Design, Development, Product and Research are seamlessly incorporated into the development loop to build better products faster.

pages___buttons.title: Product @ UXDX
pages___buttons.meta_title: Product Managers - Define the Product Direction
pages___buttons.meta_description: Join the UXDX Conference 2019 where you will earn the new UXDX model,  a new agile delivery model that brings designers, developers and product managers together.

pages___buttons.title: Women in Tech, Public Speaking Programme by UXDX
pages___buttons.meta_title: Women in Tech, Public Speaking Programme by UXDX
pages___buttons.meta_description: Highlighting females who are already advancing the tech field

pages___buttons.title: Terms & Conditions
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Conference 2019 - Ticket Terms
pages___buttons.meta_description: What you need to know about your event ticket for the UXDX Conference in Dublin on 7-8 October 2019.

pages___buttons.title: Code of Conduct
pages___buttons.meta_title: UXDX Code of Conduct | Dublin 7-8 October
pages___buttons.meta_description: UXDX is dedicated to providing an enjoyable, respectful and harassment-free event experience for everyone. See our Code of Conduct
